Comments_List:
Strengths: making us develop our own project meant we were attached and invested in the work we were doing and really extended our knowledge
Weakness: more clear instructions of tasks at hand

Yes, learning about UNICEF programming for global child health issues from the expert Dr. Alipui is a privilege. Students get to research into often neglected issues and think of solutions -- a unique practicum course!
Yes - if you are interested in development and Africa then this course really helps extend your knowledge
